description:
1. I love you not because of who you are, but because of who I am when I am with you.

我爱你不是因为你是谁，而是因为在你面前我可以是谁。

2.Never frown, even when you are sad, because you never know who is falling in love with your smile.

就算你不快乐也不要皱眉，因为你永不知道谁会爱上你的笑容。

3. Love without end hath no end.

情绵绵，爱无边。

4.But if the while I think on thee, dear friend, all losses are restored, and sorrows end.

只要我一想起你，亲爱的人，所有的失落和遗憾烟消云散。 

5. Love is not a matter of counting the days. It’s making the days count.

爱情不是数着日子过去，它让每个日子都变得有意义。 

6.Never frown, even when you are sad, because you never know who is falling in love with your smile.

纵然伤心，也不要愁眉不展，因为你不知是谁会爱上你的笑容。

7.The only present love demands is love.

爱所祈求的唯一礼物就是爱。

8. I hope before long to press you in my arms and shall shower on you a million burning kisses as under the Equator.

希望不久我将把你紧紧地搂在怀中，吻你亿万次，像在赤道下面那样炽烈的吻。

9.First love is unforgettable all one's life.

初恋是永生难忘的。

10.Love is a fire which burns unseen.

爱情是无形燃烧的火焰。

  • 20年前追星VS现在追星：节操是啥 能吃么？

title: 英语爱情名言：我爱你不是因为你是谁

description:
1.Grow old along with me! The best is yet to be.—Robert Browning

和我一起慢慢变老吧!最好的日子还在后头。——罗伯特·布朗宁

2.For you see, each day I love you more. Today more than yesterday and less than tomorrow.—Rosemonde Gerard

你知道吗?我每天都爱你更多。今天爱的比昨天多，明天爱的比今天多。——罗丝蒙德·杰拉德

3.But to see her was to love her, love but her, and love her forever.—Robert Burn

谁见她就会爱她，谁爱她就会永远爱她。——罗伯特·彭斯

4.During the whole life, you will regret for two things: one is that you don’t get the one you love and the other is the one you love is not happy. 

人的一生，有两种遗憾最折磨人：一是得不到你心爱的人；二是心爱的人得不到幸福。 

5.Within you I lose myself, without you I find myself wanting to be lost again.

有了你，我迷失了自我。失去你，我多么希望自己再度迷失。

6. I'll think of you every step of the way.

我会想你，在漫漫长路的每一步。

7. Passionate love is a quenchless thirst.

热烈的爱情是不可抑制的渴望。

8.Where there is love, there are always wishes.

哪里有爱，哪里就有希望。

9. There is no hiding from lover's eyes.

什么也瞒不过恋人的眼睛。

10.Whn the words "I love you" were said by you for the first time, my world blossoms.

第一次听到你对我说"我爱你"，我的世界一瞬间鲜花绽开。
